argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringnegcl.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ringnegcl.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 |  | ringnegcl.3 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_rngogrpo | |- ( R e. RingOps -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 5 | 2, 3 | #P_grpoinvcl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) e. X ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) e. X ) |
